    BSides Jacksonville 2025

    Training: November 14th
    Conference: November 15th
    At The University of North Florida, University Center.

    Call for Sponsors

    BSides JAX is organized by volunteers and relies on funding from industry sponsors. Please consider sponsoring BSides Jacksonville 2025.

    2025 Sponsor Package

    Call for Trainers

    Training will be on November 14th at UNF. If you are interested in teaching, please click below an fill out the form for consideration.

    Call for Speakers

    If you are interested in speaking at this years conference, the call for speakers will open on July 2nd.

    Tickets will go onsale in August 18. Be sure not to miss out on early-bird discounts!
